mapper.insert: insert into CENTER_AUDIT (REVTYPE,ID,CENTER_PASSWORD,CENTER_NAME,CENTER_DESCRIPTION,CENTER_OPEN_STATUS,CENTER_PASSWORD_OLD,CENTER_NAME_OLD,CENTER_DESCRIPTION_OLD,CENTER_OPEN_STATUS_OLD,CENTER_MODIFIEDDATE,CENTER_MODIFIEDBY) VALUES ( #{audit.revType, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{audit.id, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{audit.centerPassword, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{audit.centerName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{audit.centerDescription, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{audit.centerOpenStatus, jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{audit.centerPasswordOld, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{audit.centerNameOld, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{audit.centerDescriptionOld, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{audit.centerOpenStatusOld, jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{audit.centerModifiedDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{audit.centerModifiedBy, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
